member.name: T:NLog.My.Resources.Resources
member.summary: A strongly-typed resource class, for looking up localized strings, etc.

member.name: P:NLog.My.Resources.Resources.ResourceManager
member.summary: Returns the cached ResourceManager instance used by this class.

member.name: P:NLog.My.Resources.Resources.Culture
member.summary: Overrides the current thread's CurrentUICulture property for all resource lookups using this strongly typed resource class.

member.name: T:NLog.NLog2Extensions
member.summary: Extension methods for NLog 2.0 to be used by assemblies that conditionally reference NLog 4.5. Methods have the same signature as the newly added methods in NLog 4.5, but the contents call the deprecated methods as defined in NLog 2.0. This allows new code to be written in a solution that references 4.5, but maintains backwards-compatibility for configurations that still reference the older libraries.

member.name: M:NLog.NLog2Extensions.Debug(NLog.Logger,System.Exception,System.String)
member.summary: Extension method for 2.0 to log a message at the level with an exception, using the syntax from NLog 4.5

member.name: M:NLog.NLog2Extensions.Debug(NLog.Logger,System.Exception,System.String,System.Object[])
member.summary: Extension method for 2.0 to log a formatted message at the level with an exception, using the syntax from NLog 4.5
member.param: String message to be logged, with argument parameters
Arguments to replace format items in the given
